snippet: The Argentine military regime committed many unspeakable crimes during the "dirty war" of the late 1970s. The most nightmarish was their systematic theft of the babies of mothers they tortured and killed.
abstract: The Argentine military regime committed many unspeakable crimes during the "dirty war" of the late 1970s. The most nightmarish was their systematic theft of the babies of mothers they tortured and killed.

headline.main: Justice at Last for Argentina's Stolen Children
